sentences.sContent: If you see litter in the corridor, pick it up.
sentences.sCn: 如果你看到走廊里有垃圾，就把它捡起来。

synos.tran: 垃圾；轿，担架；一窝（动物的幼崽）；凌乱

remMethod.val: 把little的“l”丢掉， 错拿了“r” → 乱扔； 注意不要和glitter(vi. 闪光)相混

words.tran: 在街道或公共场所乱丢垃圾的人

trans.tranOther: Litter is rubbish or waste that is left lying around outside
